description: Number of sequences of consecutive nonnegative integers (including sequences of length 1) that sum to n.
comments: Number of nonnegative integer solutions (x, y) to the equation (2*x + y)*(1 + y)/2 = n. - _Gionata Neri_, Nov 15 2015
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) vector(100, n, local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x*O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2+A)^2/eta(x+A), n)) + numdiv(n>>valuation(n, 2))) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Nov 15 2015
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 13 2000
